presets.name: Automatic IR False Color
presets.expression: IR11=({10.5um}, brightness_temperature_celsius, -60, 40);lm=equp(maps/landmask.png);land=lut(lut/2dfc/2dfc_ir_land.png);sea=lut(lut/2dfc/2dfc_ir_sea.png);lm(0) == 1 ? land(IR11, 0, 0) : sea(IR11, 0, 0),lm(0) == 1 ? land(IR11, 0, 1) : sea(IR11, 0, 1),lm(0) == 1 ? land(IR11, 0, 2) : sea(IR11, 0, 2)

presets.name: Automatic< WEFAX-like False Color
presets.expression: VIS=({0.86um}, reflective_radiance, 0.000000, 56.760000);lm=equp(maps/landmask.png);land=lut(lut/2dfc/2dfc_vis_wefax_land.png);sea=lut(lut/2dfc/2dfc_vis_wefax_sea.png);lm(0) == 1 ? land(VIS, 0, 0) : sea(VIS, 0, 0),lm(0) == 1 ? land(VIS, 0, 1) : sea(VIS, 0, 1),lm(0) == 1 ? land(VIS, 0, 2) : sea(VIS, 0, 2)

presets.name: HVC
presets.expression: lut=lut(lut/WXtoImg-HVC-1.png); lut(ch1, ch4, 0), lut(ch1, ch4, 1), lut(ch1, ch4, 2)

presets.name: MCIR (Uncalibrated)
presets.expression: bm=equp(maps/map_aweeri.jpg); chb * (chb) + (1-chb) * bm(0), chb * (chb) + (1-chb) * bm(1), chb * (chb) + (1-chb) * bm(2)

presets.name: MSA (Uncalibrated)
presets.expression: bm=equp(maps/map_aweeri.jpg); ch=(cha) * 1.5;ch * (ch) + (1-ch) * bm(0), ch * (ch) + (1-ch) * bm(1), ch * (ch) + (1-ch) * bm(2)

presets.name: MCIR
presets.expression: cch4=({10.5um}, emissive_radiance, 120.000000, 20.000000); bm=equp(maps/map_aweeri.jpg); cch4 * (cch4) + (1-cch4) * bm(0), cch4 * (cch4) + (1-cch4) * bm(1), cch4 * (cch4) + (1-cch4) * bm(2)

presets.name: MSA
presets.expression: cch1=({0.67um}, sun_angle_compensated_reflective_radiance, 0.000000, 46.203000); bm=equp(maps/map_aweeri.jpg); cch1 * (cch1) + (1-cch1) * bm(0), cch1 * (cch1) + (1-cch1) * bm(1), cch1 * (cch1) + (1-cch1) * bm(2)
